snippet.title: Infinity Nikki Version 1.2 [Firework Season] Trailer
snippet.description:
Infinity Nikki Version 1.2 [Firework Season] begins January 23rd!
As fireworks light up the night sky, a fantastical adventure unfolds on the new event Isles, and a mysterious ship from the Linlang Empire arrives... The grand celebration is about to begin, and Miraland welcomes all stylists!

♾️The official trailer for Version 1.2 [Firework Season] is now live!
Reflected in the eyes of The Wishing One, the all-caring Sprite...
A glimmer of sparkle, a touch of luck...
Should you find yourself lost in the depths or adrift in shadow...
He shall deliver the guidance of Whim.

——
The Coziest Open-World Game
Infinity Nikki Version 1.2 [Firework Season] launches globally on January 23rd!
➤ Download Now: https://infinitynikki.onelink.me/P6fe/18mhpj2z 
➤ Join us on Discord: https://infinitynikki.onelink.me/ztRk/6wcxio1z
